title: Supplemental Information Dysregulated Type I Interferon and Inflammatory Monocyte-Macrophage Responses Cause Lethal Pneumonia in SARS-CoV-Infected Mice
body: week old BALB/c or Ifnar -/mice were intranasally infected with 1x 10 5 PFU of SARS-CoV. Mice were monitored for weight loss and survival. (B) 8-9 month BALB/c or Ifnar -/mice were intranasally infected with 100 PFU of SARS-CoV. Mice were monitored for weight loss and survival. (C-D) 7-9 week old BALB/c and Ifnar -/mice were monitored for weight loss and survival following MHV-1 (5x10 4 PFU/mouse, i.n.) (C) and PR8 (500 TCID50, i.n.) infection (D). These data represent 2 independent experiments with 4-6 mice/group.
